item.title: tl;dr: pka2xml-aws
item.description: After having more or less finished working on pka2xml I've decided embark on a new jurney; porting the tool to the aws C++ lambda runtime and create a small frontend to go with it.

item.title: Reverse Engineering Packet Tracer Network Simulation Files
item.description: Preface As a high school IT student I often find myself using Packet Tracer as a surrogate to "real life networking".
